Text: Thanks for this, no idea what your description means though!

ingo swann pioneered remote viewing-brown went for a shape-where as the military went for actual targets-weapons dumps,nuclear facilities ,russian submarine locations-they left the military to work for oil+gas companies,saving millions on drilling by viewing potential fields-then drilling etc.Many now work for nasa-only the work is classified under the 200 year secrecy act-Again remote viewing space saves millions on flying people & equipment there-there are several good books-a good start would be  Jim marrs alien agenda -thats covers most rv stories plus the unexpected results,such as the russian submarine that was hit by a uso several years ago,interesting stuff....
